txt.en:
Ailgar,

Do not worry yourself over RÃºvaran. He has been a useful pawn before, and will be again. He intends to take thirty men with him on his errand, but he will not bear the artifact himself; he is too cautious to subject himself to its magic without cause.

The tower will be in your care while he is gone. If you have need of additional guards, send word to me at once.

Magith the Scather
